data.caption: Listing of Equity Shares of Sri Lotus Developers and Realty Ltd
data.news_body: Trading Members of the Exchange are hereby informed that effective from August 06 2025 the equity shares of Sri Lotus Developers and Realty Ltd  (Scrip Code: 544469) are listed and admitted to dealings on the Exchange in the list of B Group Securities. For further details please refer to the notice no. 20250805- dated August 05 2025.
